hasRichItems

public boolean hasRichItems()
Determines if this document has rich items (eg files or textareas). This determines if the post in the form tag should be mime or plain

setIsRichDocument

public void setIsRichDocument(boolean bOnOff)
The rich document is used when generating the form tags. Setting the parameter to true will cause the document to be uploaded to be "multipart/form-data", ie MIME encoded.

Parameters:
bOnOff -
